mapper.select: select id, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, question_content, question_answer, question_explain, question_score, question_level, question_subject, question_type from boot_shiro_vue_stu.question_fill_judge where id = #{id}

select id, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, question_content, question_answer, question_explain, question_score, question_level, question_subject, question_type from boot_shiro_vue_stu.question_fill_judge limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into boot_shiro_vue_stu.question_fill_judge(create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, question_content, question_answer, question_explain, question_score, question_level, question_subject, question_type) values (#{createId}, #{createTime}, #{updateId}, #{updateTime}, #{questionContent}, #{questionAnswer}, #{questionExplain}, #{questionScore}, #{questionLevel}, #{questionSubject}, #{questionType})
mapper.update:
update boot_shiro_vue_stu.question_fill_judge
create_id = #{createId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
question_content = #{questionContent},
question_answer = #{questionAnswer},
question_explain = #{questionExplain},
question_score = #{questionScore},
question_level = #{questionLevel},
question_subject = #{questionSubject},
question_type = #{questionType},
where id = #{id}
